description: Detects a possible persistence mechanism using RUN key for Windows Explorer and pointing to a suspicious folder
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
oscd.community
name: Registry Persistence via Explorer Run Key
query: (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Cc][Ii][Ee][Ss]\\[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\\[Rr][Uu][Nn]/ AND ((winlog.event_data.Details:(/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\\$[Rr][Ee][Cc][Yy][Cc][Ll][Ee]\.[Bb][Ii][Nn]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]\\.*/)) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\.*/)))
